1.0.name: wordpress/adknowledge-engage
1.0.description:
The best way to recommend and recirculate your content. Show related posts and advertisements with your content.

Adknowledge Engage is an advanced recommendation and recirculation tool for your blog! Our advanced technology continuously analyzes your website content, and displays related content from your website. This plugin ultimately leads to higher page-views for your website, a better user experience for your readers, and an increase in revenue opportunities for you as a publisher.

Installing this plugin is as simple as activating it, but you must register as an Adknowledge Engage publisher first. Once you've activated the plugin, and have added your domain to your Adknowledge Engage account, you can leave the rest to us.

Our plugin will inherit the CSS styles of your blog or website, but you can edit certa
